items.name: LEVERKUSEN

hoursOfOperation.remarks:
Summer:
Monday to Saturday 08.00-11:00 and 12:00-16:30 UTC 
Sunday or holiday 08.00-11:00 and 13:00-16:30 UTC 

Winter:
Monday to Saturday 09:00-12:00 and 13:00-17:30 UTC 
Sunday or holiday 09:00-12:00 and 14:00-17:30 UTC 

Other times between BCMT and ECET PPR.
